snaforslack.utility.json

Class JFileScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • snaforslack.utility.json.JFileScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IntJFileScanner

    public class JFileScanner
extends java.lang.Object
implements IntJFileScanner
    This class consists of the attributes and methods to Scan a JSON. Using org.json.simple API.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<java.io.File> jfiles
      Contains all of the JSON files paths extracted from the specidied directory.
